Paragraph numbers work
.
Paragraph text.
.
<p><a ¶="1" id="¶1" href="#¶1">1</a>Paragraph text.</p>
.

Empty paragraphs in containers do not receive numbers
.
> **Paragraph text.**
>
> {¶=¶}
.
<blockquote ¶="¶">
